Writing children are really interesting... I must agree though that 
there is that barrier when they turn evil... ^__^ Just kidding... But 
yes I tend to agree 3 below are very cute and lovable while those 
older 4 above start being a little mischievous. 

And I like how you can write short stories and get the point across. 

~Kizu

--- In SHQ_Spy_Division@yahoogroups.com, "secretary" 
<secretarytocapt3@h...> wrote:
> 
> Thank you Barb(^_^)
> I wrote the story because I always wondered how children "think".  
> From interacting with my niece it is clear that children at that 
age 
> are very intelligent and have outstanding memories even when they 
are 
> only 2 years old....when they turn 4 they generally become *evil*.
> 
> [correction to the story] I was writing it on the bus and must've 
> scribbled Feb 1 instead of Feb 9...Fujita Minoru was actually born 
> Feb 9 (oops, sorry)
> ------------------------------------

> http://www.shinsengumihq.com/ "Girls of the Shinsengumi Contest"
> comments for the entries may be posted at 
> http://www.shinsengumimb.com look under "fanart"
> 
> from all the Instant Messages and emails I've been receiving I 
think 
> we will have considerably MORE submissions than the uniform contest 
> (which means that Moeyoken is actually a GOOD commercial 
idea)...the 
> prize, the Shinsengumi tenugui has arrived today and it is 
AWESOME!!!!
> 
> If I DO get MANY submissions I may add minor prizes (so don't 
worry).
>
